data.title: Declassified documents detail 9/11 commission's inquiry into Saudi Arabia, Chilling story of the Saudi diplomat who, many on the commission’s staff believed, had been a ringleader of a Saudi government spy network inside the US that gave support to at least two of the 9/11 hijackers
Ontario parents who object to vaccines could be forced to take a class in science of immunization.
Nearly 90,000 Gallons of Crude Oil Spill Into Gulf of Mexico
ISIS massacre 14 Real Madrid fans at supporters club in Baghdad
Chinese Cops Are Temporarily Patrolling the Streets of Rome & Milan - A new experimental program put international police at Italy's tourist hubs to help the influx of Chinese travelers

Luxembourg Is Set to Become the Most Animal-Friendly Country in the World - Proposed new animals rights legislation — which states animals are sentient beings with certain rights, who can experience anguish — has been described as the most progressive in the world.
Chinese province has ordered kindergartens to enforce a ban on religious activity after a video was posted online of a little girl reciting part of the Koran at a nursery school
Women in Saudi Arabia face flogging and imprisonment if they check their husband’s phone without his permission.
Dutch professor renounces Turkish award, brands Erdogan 'de-facto dictator'
Erdoğan says West cares more about gay and animal rights than Syria
